item.title: About Me
item.description: About I’ve been an Animaiton Industry Professional for over 10 years, and spent a majority of that time as a Rigging Artist. I really enjoy the gratifcaiton I get from solving technical problems. Tools I’m Using Maya, UE5, Blender PyCharm/VSCode Vim Git Rocky Linux
